name: Impartial Blade
description:
"Out of Control." The sword you use is impartial, and can be countered by an enemy to switch sides and fight you instead. Of course, you can get it back with some finesse.

This is my first game jam game, second game total (not on itch yet), for the GMTK jam 2020. Controls in the game. I didn't have enough time to do as much as I wanted with the concept, so I might add to it in the future. No sound, sorry. All environmental art created by  AblazePython (https://ablazepython.itch.io/) Character art created by me. Have fun and thanks for giving it a shot!
